name: June Carter Cash
description:
'''Valerie June Carter Cash''' (June 23, 1929 – May 15, 2003) was an American [[Country music|country]] singer and songwriter. A five-time [[Grammy Award]]–winner, she was a member of the [[Carter Family]] and the second wife of singer [[Johnny Cash]]. Prior to her marriage to Cash, she was known as '''June Carter''', and she continued to be credited as such even after her marriage (as well as on songwriting credits predating it). She played guitar, [[banjo]], harmonica, and [[autoharp]], and acted in several films and television shows. Carter Cash was inducted into the Christian Music Hall of Fame in 2009.

Carter Cash will be [[List of Country Music Hall of Fame inductees|inducted]] into the [[Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum]] in 2025.
